alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Eddy; Grand Forks; Griggs; Nelson; Steele; Walsh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 11:05PM CDT until June 20 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Grand Forks County in northeastern North Dakota... Nelson County in northeastern North Dakota... Griggs County in southeastern North Dakota... Northwestern Barnes County in southeastern North Dakota... Western Walsh County in northeastern North Dakota... Southeastern Eddy County in northeastern North Dakota... Northwestern Steele County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1104 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Pekin to near Sharon, moving northeast at 60 mph. At 1100 PM CDT, a 68 mph wind gust was reported near Cooperstown. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Mapes and Logan Center around 1120 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Michigan, Kempton, Petersburg, Larimore, Whitman, Dahlen, Arvilla, Emerado, Honeyford, Mekinock and Grand Forks AFB. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 153 and 158. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Barnes; Eddy; Grand Forks; Griggs; Nelson; Steele; Walsh
